about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'Retired Porn Actress' story from 'Obedient Women'.

Retired Porn Actress

HEROINE:
Fumika Shishido
A housewife has a big secret which must not be discovered.

SYNOPSIS (Retired Porn Actress)

A husband and wife move in next door to the main character.
She's very beautiful, like a model.
The main character's a porn geek and definitely recognizes her face.
She's a recently retired porn actress. He has actually attended one of her fan-only events and is quite familiar with her body.
He sets out to confirm it by letter.
His threatening letter implies that she gave him a blowjob during the previous fan-only event.
He asks her to give him her panties and to start masturbating during the day, buck naked, with the curtains open, etc.
Finally, he asks her for a blowjob again.
He threatens her to follow his instructions, such as handjobs and blowjobs, otherwise he's going to tell all the neighbors.
He finds out that her crotch has gotten wet. He then forcefully has sex with her.
Finally, she reaches a mind-blowing climax.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.
